Title: The Court of Bones
Description:
The mogu within the nearby Court of Bones comprise one of the greatest threats to our presence on this island. Narasi Snowdawn has been entrusted with halting their efforts, but I am certain she could use a capable $c to see this task through.

Go to her. Aid in whatever ways that you are able.
ObjectivesText: Find Narasi Snowdawn outside the Court of Bones.
RewardText: Yes, good, come... there is work to be done.
